timeline.body: You can always return `wantedRules.subList(position, wantedRules.size())`, even if `position == wantedRules.size()`.
timeline.bodyText: You can always return wantedRules.subList(position, wantedRules.size()), even if position == wantedRules.size().
timeline.bodyHTML: You can always return wantedRules.subList(position, wantedRules.size()), even if position == wantedRules.size().
timeline.author: hakonhall

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
return position == wantedRules.size() ? List.of() : wantedRules.subList(position, wantedRules.size());
return wantedRules.subList(position, wantedRules.size());
timeline.author: freva
